info.name: Vim-like tabs
info.description: Style makes firefox tabs like VIM ncruses-tabs
info.additionalInfo:
Tested in Firefox 6 and 7.

To hiding 'close' button on tabs, set browser.tabs.closeButtons to 2. (only in Firefox 7 on me)
To hiding 'new tab' button, you must remove it using the 'Customise' menu.
